sentences.en: On the same conditions , the device begin to saturate when IF power reaches ? 5 dBm.
sentences.cn: 中频输入功率大约在-5dBm时开始进入饱和状态.

sentences.en: Saturate a cotton wool pad and sweep across a cleansed face and neck.
sentences.cn: 用化妆棉沾适量并涂于面部及颈部.

sentences.en: Saturate the meat in the mixture of oil and herbs.
sentences.cn: 把肉浸泡在油和作料的卤汁里.

sentences.en: Saturate the moss with water before planting the bulbs in it.
sentences.cn: 在种植球茎于苔藓中之前,先用水浸透苔藓.

sentences.en: Scrub in small circles and be careful to saturate the wood.
sentences.cn: 擦洗时可以打着小圈,注意不要浸透木头.

sentences.en: The color laydown is very even and will saturate heavy watercolor paper easily.
sentences.cn: 颜色laydown是非常均匀,将沉重的水彩纸容易饱和.

sentences.en: The effective permeability is stated as some numerical value at some given saturate conditions.
sentences.cn: 有效渗透率用在一定饱和条件下的数值表示.

sentences.en: The searchings seem to contradict the sensual saturate the ads in female magazines.
sentences.cn: 这一些研究结果似乎跟充斥于女孩合订本中的各种性感广告相矛盾.

sentences.en: Thus, growers should saturate the planting with bees at bloom time.
sentences.cn: 因此在花期, 果园最好是蜜蜂满园.

sentences.en: To saturate with water and make soggy or unusable.
sentences.cn: 吸取过量用水浸透使湿润或不能用.

sentences.en: Water poured through the hole, saturating the carpet.
sentences.cn: 水从洞里流进来，浸湿了地毯。

sentences.en: We'll saturate California with the rise in its crime rate.
sentences.cn: 我们将使加利福尼亚州的犯罪案件增长率达到饱和点.

words.tran_cn: 饱和的；渗透的；深颜色的
饱和；色饱和度；浸透；磁化饱和
使渗透，使饱和（saturate的过去式）
浸透的，饱和的；深颜色的
浸透，使湿透；使饱和，使充满

trans.tran_cn: 浸透的，饱和的；深颜色的
使湿透， 浸透； 使充满， 使饱和
